lesson: Unit 6 - Making Plans for the Future Quiz

questions.question: Why is making a plan for the future important?
Why is it helpful to set long-term and short-term goals?
answers: To break down big ideas into manageable steps.
To do the same thing every day.
To make sure you never adjust your path.
questions.correct: To break down big ideas into manageable steps.

questions.question: What is one benefit of making a timeline for a goal?
answers: It gives a deadline and sense of urgency.
It means you can forget about it.
questions.correct: It gives a deadline and sense of urgency.

questions.question: Why is it helpful to review and adjust your plans periodically?
answers: To stay aligned with your priorities.
To make sure you never try.
To remain in the same spot.
questions.correct: To stay aligned with your priorities.

questions.question: What can help you stay on track with long-term goals?
answers: Setting milestones and checking your progress.
questions.correct: Setting milestones and checking your progress.

questions.question: Why is it important to consider potential obstacles when making a plan?
answers: To be better prepared and adaptable.
To make it harder to stay focused.
questions.correct: To be better prepared and adaptable.

questions.question: What role does motivation play in making future plans?
answers: It keeps you going when things get challenging.
It encourages you to forget your goal.
questions.correct: It keeps you going when things get challenging.

questions.question: Why is it helpful to write down your future goals?
answers: It makes them more concrete and actionable.
It means you can ignore them.
questions.correct: It makes them more concrete and actionable.

questions.question: What can you do when you achieve a goal?
answers: Reward yourself and set a new one.
questions.correct: Reward yourself and set a new one.

questions.question: Why is it helpful to have both short- and long-term goals?
answers: Short-term goals help build towards long-term achievements.
questions.correct: Short-term goals help build towards long-term achievements.

questions.question: How can making a vision board help with future planning?
answers: It gives a visual reminder of your goals.
It guarantees forgetting about your future.
questions.correct: It gives a visual reminder of your goals.

questions.question: Why is prioritization important when making future plans?
answers: To focus on what matters most.
To try doing everything at once.
questions.correct: To focus on what matters most.

questions.question: What can help you stay motivated as you work towards future goals?
Why is it helpful to adjust your future plans as life changes?
answers: To stay realistic and aligned with your circumstances.
To forget about making any future plans.
To give up on making any changes.
questions.correct: To stay realistic and aligned with your circumstances.
